Aptivate http://aptivate.org/ Project Manager in Cambridge or Brighton UK or REMOTE with some restrictions (see http://aptivate.org/en/about/join-us/agile-project-manager/)

A not-for-profit empowering ordinary people across the developing world to improve their lives. Our projects are mostly in International Development; often on-line or mobile services, sometimes in-country interventions, always with a IT angle.

We're looking for someone to manage projects: not just agile process: getting involved in all aspects of project lifecycle to help make positive change in the world.
